item.title: Community: my first steps
item.description: Time flies. 15 years ago I published my first community fuelled website. It’s long gone of course but I can still tell the story. It all started with an anniversary One of my all-time favourite children’s TV show went into it’s 25th year at the time. I still watched it on a regular basis and so I had an idea. Why not send a special greeting card? One that would be fun to make and a bit different?
